alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 30 at 12:28PM MST until July 30 at 3:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The Pipeline Fire East in... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 330 PM MST. * At 1228 PM MST, gauge reports indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Pipeline Fire East. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Pipeline Fire East. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Pipeline Fire East. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wupatki Trails, Timberline, Hutchison Acres and Lockett Meadow Campground. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Flash flooding is occurring or imminent downstream of the Pipeline Fire scar, including Wupatki Trails, Fernwood, Hutchinson Acres, Macann Estates and Doney Park. Flood waters will impact roads, including Highway 89. Shelter in place until the waters recede. Stay out of flood waters!
